column5: Has anyone had any luck or know anything about Pakashkan Lake off of Graham Road? I have fished a few other lakes in the area and had great luck, but the old man (dad) requires a cabin this year. We are looking at early July. Thanks for any help or advise.
This is a great lake for Walleye. You will do very well.
I hope so! Thanks for the reply. I was not sure if there was anyone out there. Do you know of anyone that sells a decent lake map?

One of our Electrical suppliers puts on a little party there every year. I am fishing it this year with about a dozen of the boys. They do great every year. A depth map is available at the resort there.
Thanks for the info. Good luck. I am going up in early July.
